scripts.figmagic: yarn figmagic:clean && yarn run figmagic:savefromapi && yarn figmagic:build && yarn figmagic:getimages && yarn figmagic:downloadimages
scripts.figmagic:clean: rm -rf specs/ && rm -rf tokens/ && rm -rf figma
scripts.figmagic:tokens: yarn figmagic:clean && yarn figmagic:savefromapi && yarn figmagic:build
